div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 463 Banat district, W. Rumania, 1804 Burial: 3rd cent. B.C.? (T) Contents: 184+ AR Philip II: 58+ tetradr. (chiefly imit.) Alexander III: 106+ tetradr. Disposition: Vienna part Bergmann, SbWien 28 (1858), p. 552 Pink, Münzprägung der Ostkelten, pp. 41-4, illus. (37 imit.)
